1008130.name: Godsend Arena
1008130.description:
Take control of the gods as they fight to regain their power and standing amongst their followers in Godsend Arena, an all-new real-time multiplayer tower defense game that features fast and action-packed gameplay. Use unique and power-packed abilities, potent artifacts, and ultimate skills kill swarms of monsters as you compete to take down your opponent in real-time PVP battles.

Game features:

Enhance your heroes with hundreds of skill combinations to give them devastating combat powers.

Collect unique skill effects including magical spells, curses, and the ability to summon monsters

Conquer global and local leaderboards to win valuable rewards to prove you have the most powerful gods

Experience new events with weekly themed Boss Challenges

Regular game updates will deliver new heroes, new skills, new maps, new modes and new events in the future, so stay tuned!
1008130.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
